info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Transforms a bit measure into a binary measure setting the value to 0 when the correspondant bit is 0 and to 1 otherwise.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - measure : input measure.
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] Export bit_measure as a binary measure. oph_bit_export('','OPH_DOUBLE',bit_measure)
